pr_title: Config changes that may impact precedence order for overlapping config defined in multiple places.

timeline.message:
Refactor Config using ConfigProvider

This changes some semantics of config a bit... for example the order of precedence between aliases and other sources.

Additional tests are needed for various providers, but ConfigTest should cover most cases.

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if type specific converters would be better than many static methods, but this is fine.
timeline.author: dougqh

timeline.bodyText: I think this should by error.  I also think this should fail immediately with an Exception or Error in tests.
timeline.author: dougqh

replies.bodyText: I can add an assert in ConfigProvider where the exception is being caught and ignored.
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: If ConfigProvider was a Composite of its own type rather than Sources, then this code would have less duplication.
timeline.author: dougqh

replies.bodyText: I don't understand what you mean here.
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message:
Fix coverage and revapi

Add assert for conversion exception.

timeline.author: bantonsson
